text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Iraq's frozen assets in Arab countries are $1.3 billion.
- Human rights committee at the National Assembly (parliament) discusses the Iraqi prisoners-of-war in Iran.
- Iraq prepares a programme of celebration to mark the first anniversary of the occasion in October, 1995 when President Saddam Hussein's term of office was extended for seven years more.
(The above stories were also carried by QADISSIYA and IRAQ.)
